name: Save web sites with visually matched images
description: For visual matches no direct image links available, only generated thumbnail, site title and site URL

name: Proxy configuration
description: Either use an Apify proxy, or provide your own proxy servers.

name: Max request retries
description: Try to find retries and concurrency to get best output for your image sources

name: Debug Log
description: Enable a more verbose logging to be able to understand what's happening during the scraping.
